doc.field: - Qtr ends dec 31 Shr one cent vs 15 cts Net 466,000 vs 6,866,000 Revs 123.1 mln vs 93.5 mln NOTE: the company changed its fiscal year end from Aug 31 to Dec 31. qtr prior ended Jan 17, 1986 and included two more weeks than current qtr. current qtr includes loss 899,000 for accounting change.
